description:
An unique and awesome kamasutra app for your iOS devices. It will spice up your love life with its usefull and funny features. Amazing graphics and detailed positions described with 3D images and professional texts.
iSutras is the perfect app for anyone interested about love.

The Kamasutra is an ancient Indian book about human love behavior. But not everybody knows that it doesn't contain only sex position. Infact it's for the most based on the concepts of love meant as art, the "kama", on social relations, on relashionships between two lovers and on physical and psycological well-being.

Extra features:
SpinSutra - A so funny game! Randomness is the key for a hot success, it could be more spicy by adding some other actions or body parts, the limit is your imagination.
Position of love - The position different for each couple, let's see if that corresponds to your souls. Not enough? There is a suggestion for each day.
Fertility - Useful and simplicity, it shows you the most fertile week of your partner, so if you want a baby you could try in that week, if not… guess what!
Sweet call - Following the steps you can add a shortcut on your home to call and send SMS to your lover, without any need of internet connection.
releaseNotes:
Remove all ads!!! :)
Please leave a review on iTunes, it helps us a lot!
